Series.Actors: |Sarah Jones|Jorge Garcia|Sam Neill|Leon Rippy|Jonny Coyne|Parminder Nagra|David Hoflin|Robert Forster|Jason Butler Harner|
Series.Overview: Detective Rebecca Madsen and Alcatraz historian Doctor Diego Soto team up with a secret agency that is dedicated to finding and catching inmates from the infamous prison who went missing 50 years ago and are reappearing today. The special task force includes Emerson Hauser and Doctor Lucy Banerjee.
